title: Which college is best for studying CS in Greater Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer science in easy language is the science of studying about all things which relates to computer. This includes topic like hardware and software ), algorithm, theory, logic, data structure, and programming language.   Career in Computer Science If you are nt sure about your career in computer science, then you should ask yourself that what makes me excited about computers or technology? For example, theoretical side of the computer, or practical one. I am mentioning some fields in which you can start your career- Software DevelopersHardware EngineersSystem AnalystNetworking EngineersDatabase AdministratorsHere i am talking about a college which offers B.TECH in Computer Science enginering with specializations and has tied up with some renowned companies for certifications, KCC Institute of Technology and Management, located in Greater Noida. KCC always keeps its focus on practical knowledge and gives specializations in following fields Cloud Computing & Networking, Java programming & Oracle, Artificial Intelligence & Machine, Hadoop & Big Data, and Web and Mobile Development Students will get trained by the experts and get certified in these fields under the name of globally renowned companies KCC has tied up with such as Oracle Microsoft Redhat for Linux Autodesk for 3D designing CISCO E-Yantra IIT Bombay for robotics Texas Instruments INFRASTRUCTURE Largest campus spread over in 40 acres. Labs in KCC are well equipped, well maintained with state-of-art equipment. Computer Science labs are wifi connected. KCC has association with MICROSOFT for software licensing.   CURRICULUM IT industries are changing rapidly the demand so as demand of experts and it is not possible with academic syllabus studies because increase in demand is directly proportional to competition. KCCITM curriculum is the perfect combination of practical knowledge and theoretical knowledge. The Department of Computer Science always try to give ideal and practical knowledge to the students.    PLACEMENTS KCC gives 80-85% average placements in Computer Science Engineering. Mass Recruiters of KCCITM which often visit are HCL, IBM, BYJU’s, Cognizant, Tech Mahindra, Extramarks, Infosys, Wipro,and still counting. It also arranges technical quizzes for students time to time to take part in.

You should see KCC Institute of Technology and Management College once for B.Tech CSE, this college is really best for engineering course because it has established a national reputation as one of the finest technology institutes in the country.  The institute is affiliated to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Formerly known as UPTU and approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD, Govt. of India. Build on a sprawling 40 acre campus in Greater Noida and it offers a full range of degree courses in all major branches of engineering which are fully recognized by the Government of India. It has state-of-the-art infrastructure with all resources and Wi-Fi enabled buildings with a huge playground. All the labs and classrooms are well-equipped with the latest technology. All computer labs equipped with the latest branded core i7 processor computers and a leased line rendering 24 hours on-line availability. KCC conduct Centers for Excellence in Entrepreneurship Development & Corporate Governance. Corporate Resources Development (CRD) aimed at providing maximum exposure to the students through pro-active academic-industry synergy. It has excellent placement records in the CSE branches because it provide dedicated placement cell helps career skills assessment, resume writing, interview technique, and other skills so as to excel in the competitive market.   The college has rich intellectual pool; great focus has been laid while selecting the finest of faculty available. It arranges various things apart from studies like curricular activities, events, clubs, societies, holistic developments, fest, parties, personality development programs, etc. Apart from arranging placements for the students the placement cell maintains regular interaction with the industry, organizing visits, guest lectures, conferences, workshops, seminars, free internships, etc. Along with B.Tech CSE course, training on various valuable specializations is also provided, it is not included in the course, it is provided like an extra course because it is very much in demand by the companies, nowadays. Along with training, the certificate is also provided by the company. Many multinational companies are tie-up with college.   GOOD LUCK.
